error.name: Okay
error.about: No error occurred, function has executed successfully.</>

error.name: NoMemory
error.about: Not enough memory was available when this function attempted to allocate a memory block.</>

error.name: NoPointer
error.about: A required address pointer was not present.</>

error.name: InUse
error.about: The resource, object, or other system part is currently in use.</>

error.name: Failed
error.about: An unspecified failure has occurred.</>

error.name: File
error.about: Unspecified file error, eg file not found, disk full etc.</>

error.name: Data
error.about: This function encountered some data that has unrecoverable errors.</>

error.name: Search
error.about: An internal search was performed and it failed. This is a specific error that can occur when the function is searching inside file headers for something, eg the BODY section of an IFF file.</>

error.name: InitModule
error.about: This function tried to initialise a module and failed.</>

error.name: FileMissing
error.about: File not found, this occurs when a Location field references a file that does not exist.</>

error.name: WrongVersion
error.about: Wrong version, or the specified version is not supported.</>

error.name: Args
error.about: You tried to pass invalid arguments to this function, such as a NULL value where you should have placed a pointer.</>

error.name: NoData
error.about: The procedure expected some data, but the program did not supply any.</>

error.name: Read
error.about: Occurs if you attempt to read a file and a failure occurs. Perhaps there is nothing left to read, the file object has been invalidated, or there are surface errors on the media in question.</>

error.name: Write
error.about: Occurs if you attempt to write to a file and a failure occurs. Usually this is due to a hardware problem such as lack of space or surface errors on the recording media.</>

error.name: LockFailed
error.about: This error can occur if you attempt to get a lock on an object that is already locked out by another task, or if you try to lock an object that does not exist.</>

error.name: ExamineFailed
error.about: This error applies to files and directories. It can occur for various reasons, a probable cause could be a corrupt/invalidated area of a disk structure.</>

error.name: LostClass
error.about: This is a very serious error, which occurs if an object loses its reference to its Class. This basically means that the Object->Class pointer has been cleared or invalidated.</>

error.name: NoAction
error.about: If you call an action on an object, and if the object does not support that action, you will receive this message. An example of this could occur by attempting to draw a file, e.g. Draw(File).</>

error.name: NoSupport
error.about: Can be caused if an object fails to initialise, often due to an unsupported data format.</>

error.name: Memory
error.about: General memory error, such as no memory available, or memory too fragmented.</>

error.name: TimeOut
error.about: A time-out can occur if a function is expected to complete a process within a certain amount of time (e.g. 5 seconds). If that time runs out, this error-code will be returned.</>

error.name: NoStats
error.about: This error indicates near-fatal corruption to an object. A private Stats structure is kept in the header of each object (Object->Stats) and if it is lost, there has been an illegal clearance of this field.</>

error.name: LowCapacity
error.about: Low capacity error or warning - usually occurs when an array is almost full.</>

error.name: Init
error.about: An error occurred on a call to the Init action.</>

error.name: NoPermission
error.about: A security violation has occurred.</>

error.name: SystemCorrupt
error.about: The operating system has been badly corrupted.</>

error.name: NeedOwner
error.about: Used if an object needs an owner to operate correctly.</>

error.name: OwnerNeedsBitmap
error.about: The owner needs a Bitmap field. Can usually be solved by using a different owner or adding a virtual Bitmap field to the owner's source code.</>

error.name: KernelVersion
error.about: The kernel version is not recent enough - you need to install a more recent kernel.</>

error.name: NeedWidthHeight
error.about: You need to specify a Width and Height for the object.</>

error.name: NegativeSubClassID
error.about: Occurs if the Child ID specified for a class is less than 0.</>

error.name: NegativeClassID
error.about: Occurs if the Class ID specified for a class is less than 0.</>

error.name: MissingClassName
error.about: A newly created class has not been given a name.</>

error.name: OutOfRange
error.about: Number is out of range.</>

error.name: ObtainMethod
error.about: A call to ObtainMethod() failed.</>

error.name: ArrayFull
error.about: An array has reached capacity and cannot be expanded.</>

error.name: Query
error.about: An attempt to Query() has failed for unspecified reasons.</>

error.name: LostOwner
error.about: The object has not been assigned an owner.</>

error.name: DoNotExpunge
error.about: This code is returned by modules that do not want to be expunged by an expunge call.</>

error.name: MemoryCorrupt
error.about: Used when a memory block is known to be corrupt.</>

error.name: FieldSearch
error.about: The function could not find the field that you asked for.</>

error.name: InvalidPath
error.about: Invalid file or directory path detected.</>

error.name: SetField
error.about: An unspecific error occurred during a call to SetField().</>

error.name: MarkedForDeletion
error.about: A resource cannot be accessed as it is marked for deletion.</>

error.name: IllegalMethodID
error.about: Illegal method ID (number outside of valid range).</>

error.name: IllegalActionID
error.about: Illegal action ID (number outside of valid range).</>

error.name: ModuleOpenFailed
error.about: Module failed in its Open routine.</>

error.name: IllegalActionAttempt
error.about: An illegal attempt was made to execute an action on an object that belongs to another Task.</>

error.name: EntryMissingHeader
error.about: The ModEntry Header is missing.</>

error.name: ModuleMissingInit
error.about: Module has not defined support for Init().</>

error.name: ModuleInitFailed
error.about: Module failed its Initialisation routine.</>

error.name: MemoryDoesNotExist
error.about: Memory block does not exist - usually returned from memory functions such as FreeMemoryID() and MemoryPtrInfo().</>

error.name: DeadLock
error.about: A dead-lock was detected and the procedure was aborted. A dead-lock occurs when a task wants to use a resource that some other task has locked, but the catch is, that other task is already waiting on you to release a resource. As two tasks cannot wait on each other, the procedure must be aborted to avoid the dead-lock.</>

error.name: SystemLockedUp
error.about: An unspecified area of the system is locked-up. This can occur if a shared memory block has been exclusively accessed and not released, or some other type of unreleased access has been made.</>

error.name: ModuleMissingName
error.about: A Module has not declared an official name.</>

error.name: AddClass
error.about: An attempt to add a new class to the system failed.</>

error.name: Activate
error.about: Error while Activate()ing an object.</>

error.name: ActionFailed
error.about: An (undefined) action call to an object failed.</>

error.name: DoubleInit
error.about: An attempt to initialise an object twice was detected.</>

error.name: FieldNotSet
error.about: A required field has not been set in the object.</>

error.name: MissingClass
error.about: An object is missing its class pointer (serious corruption to the object structure is likely).</>

error.name: FileReadFlag
error.about: The File flag FL_READ was not set on initialisation.</>

error.name: FileWriteFlag
error.about: The File flag FL_WRITE was not set on initialisation.</>

error.name: Draw
error.about: An error occurred while drawing the object.</>

error.name: NoMethods
error.about: The object/class does not export any methods.</>

error.name: NoMatchingObject
error.about: No matching object was found for the given object ID.</>

error.name: AccessDenied
error.about: Failed to gain access to a shared memory block.</>

error.name: MissingLocation
error.about: The object is missing a setting in the Location field.</>

error.name: NoExclusiveLock
error.about: There is no exclusive lock on this object.</>

error.name: NoSearchResult
error.about: The search yielded no results.</>

error.name: StatementUnsatisfied
error.about: The tested statement was not satisfied.</>

error.name: ObjectCorrupt
error.about: The object structure is badly corrupted.</>

error.name: OwnerPassThrough
error.about: Owner pass through notification.</>

error.name: UnsupportedOwner
error.about: The given owner is not supported by this object.</>

error.name: False
error.about: The result is False.</>

error.name: ExclusiveDenied
error.about: An attempt to gain exclusive access to a shared object failed.</>

error.name: AllocMemory
error.about: Attempts to allocate a memory block failed.</>

error.name: NewObject
error.about: A call to NewObject() failed to produce a new object.</>

error.name: GetField
error.about: A call to GetField() failed to retrieve a field value.</>

error.name: NoFieldAccess
error.about: Access to a field was denied (usually occurs due to limited field permissions, i.e. read only or write only).</>

error.name: ReservedAssign
error.about: ResolveAssign() did not resolve the assignment because itis a reserved name, or does not need resolving.</>

error.name: InvalidDimension
error.about: This error is typically returned when an attempt to set a dimension field (e.g. width or height) uses an invalid value such as -1.</>

error.name: FieldTypeMismatch
error.about: A field mismatch indicates that a field that was being read or written does not convert to the requested type.</>

error.name: UnrecognisedFieldType
error.about: While reading or writing a field, you requested a field type that is completely invalid.</>

error.name: BufferOverflow
error.about: Through the process of normal execution, a buffer was found to be too small to hold all necessary data required to complete the process.</>

error.name: DirectoryEmpty
error.about: This error is reported when attempting to list the contents of a directory that is actually empty.</>

error.name: UnsupportedField
error.about: A requested field is not supported by the object's class.</>

error.name: Mismatch
error.about: A mismatch has been detected that prevents further processing.</>

error.name: OutOfBounds
error.about: An out-of-bounds error has occurred.</>

error.name: Seek
error.about: An attempt to seek to a new position failed. This error is usually returned when use of the Seek action fails.</>

error.name: ReallocMemory
error.about: A call to the ReallocMemory() function failed.</>

error.name: Loop
error.about: An infinite loop or recursive routine was detected and subsequently avoided.</>

error.name: FileExists
error.about: The destination file or directory already exists.</>

error.name: ResolveAssign
error.about: A directory assignment could not be resolved (usually caused by a bad assign reference in calls to ResolveAssign()).</>

error.name: CreateObject
error.about: A call to CreateObject() failed.</>

error.name: MemoryInfo
error.about: A call to the MemoryInfo() function failed.</>

error.name: ResolveFields
error.about: A call to the ResolveFields() function failed.</>

error.name: NotInitialised
error.about: The object has not been initialised for usage.</>

error.name: ResourceExists
error.about: A new resource could not be created because a matching resource exists.</>

error.name: Refresh
error.about: An attempt to refresh an object failed. Usually returned when a Refresh action fails.</>

error.name: ListChildren
error.about: A call to the ListChildren() function failed.</>

error.name: LimitedSuccess
error.about: Limited success indicates that the routine was executed with minor errors that did not lead to a complete failure.</>

error.name: Cancelled
error.about: Operation cancelled (by the user or some area of the system).</>

error.name: EmptyString
error.about: A routine that encounters an empty string where it expects to see data can return this error. An empty string is defined as a pointer that refers to a null-byte.</>

error.name: Terminate
error.about: This special error is entirely dependent upon the context in which it is returned.</>

error.name: ObjectExists
error.about: Object exists. This can have various meanings depending on the context in which it is returned. Attempting to create a unique object with a name that matches another object can produce this error.</>

error.name: Forbid
error.about: A call to the Forbid() function failed to achieve a system lock. This is a serious error that may indicate that another task has used the Forbid() function and failed to match it with a call to Permit().</>

error.name: Resize
error.about: A failure occurred during the resizing of an object.</>

error.name: Redimension
error.about: A failure occurred during the redimensioning of an object.</>

error.name: AllocSemaphore
error.about: AllocSemaphore() failed.</>

error.name: AccessSemaphore
error.about: AccessSemaphore() failed.</>

error.name: NothingDone
error.about: Don't look at me, I haven't done anything! This error code may be used when no failure has occurred, but it may be useful to communicate that no action has been taken.</>

error.name: CreateFile
error.about: Failed to create a new file.</>

error.name: DeleteFile
error.about: Deletion of dir/file failed (e.g. permissions, read-only media).</>

error.name: OpenFile
error.about: File exists but could not be opened.</>

error.name: ReadOnly
error.about: Delete/Write operation failed due to read-only status.</>

error.name: DoesNotExist
error.about: Resource/Object/File does not exist.</>

error.name: IdenticalPaths
error.about: The destination path is the same as the source path.</>

error.name: Exists
error.about: Non-specific 'something exists' error.</>

error.name: SanityFailure
error.about: A sanity check has failed.</>

error.name: OutOfSpace
error.about: Run out of space, no room to complete request.</>

error.name: GetSurfaceInfo
error.about: GetSurfaceInfo() failed. Often indicates that the surface ID does not exist.</>

error.name: Finished
error.about: Operation finished. Typically used to indicate the end to a loop.</>

error.name: StringFormat
error.about: An entered string did not meet the formatting requirements of the interpreter.</>

error.name: BadState
error.about: Object was in an incorrect state for the operation.</>

error.name: HostNotFound
error.about: The internet host name could not be resolved.</>

error.name: InvalidURI
error.about: Invalid Uniform Resource Identifier. Check the string syntax.</>

error.name: ConnectionRefused
error.about: The remote host refused the connection.</>

error.name: NetworkUnreachable
error.about: The network was unreachable.</>

error.name: HostUnreachable
error.about: No route to host.</>

error.name: Disconnected
error.about: A hard disconnect on the network occurred.</>

error.name: TaskStillExists
error.about: Task/Process still exists and is running.</>

error.name: IntegrityViolation
error.about: Database referential integrity / constraint violation.</>

error.name: SchemaViolation
error.about: Record changes would violate the database schema.</>

error.name: DataSize
error.about: The size of a data chunk is too large or does not match expectations.</>

error.name: Busy
error.about: Operation cannot complete because system is busy with an earlier operation.</>

error.name: ConnectionAborted
error.about: Attempt to connect to a network server has been aborted.</>

error.name: NullArgs
error.about: Function call missing argument value(s) - sometimes returned as an alternative to the Args error.</>

error.name: InvalidObject
error.about: An object of a different class was expected - for instance the function in question only operates on surfaces and a file object was supplied.</>

error.name: ExecViolation
error.about: Execution violation - call must be made from the task that owns the object.</>

error.name: Recursion
error.about: Detected illegal attempt at recursion.</>

error.name: IllegalAddress
error.about: Address pointer outside of the process' space.</>
